response.overview: In Crossing The Line To Love movie: three days before her wedding, freelance writer Nichole catches her fiancé in bed with her bridesmaid. In a moment of heartbreak and rage, she storms into a bar and kisses a random stranger—only to realize he’s Fabian Winston, a wildly popular contemporary artist and the sole heir to a powerful elite family. The kiss goes viral overnight. Faced with mounting public pressure and relentless media, Nichole is pushed into a contract marriage with Fabian. What starts as a scandal-driven deal slowly unravels into a messy, irresistible entanglement of power, secrets, and unexpected feelings.
response.title: Crossing The Line To Love
